articles.title: Adobe's including Frame.io collaboration software in Creative Cloud subscriptions - The Verge

articles.content:
After Effects and Premiere Pro are also getting some neat updates

articles.title: Apple’s latest M1 Mac mini returns to Amazon all-time low of $570 following $129 discount - 9to5Toys
